dct_title_s: Antiquæ vrbis Romæ imago accuratiss. ex vetustis monumentis, ex vestigiis videlicet ædificior., moeniûm ruinis, fide numismatum, monumentis æneis, plumbeis, saxeis tiglinisq[ue] collecta, veter. deniq[ue]
dct_description_sm: Relief shown pictorially. Bird's-eye-view map showing buildings and streets of ancient Rome with 269 points of interest. Title at top of sheet 1; index at bottom of sheet 2. Latin text on verso with caption title: Lectori; p. 54-55. From: Civitates orbis terrarum ... [Cologne : Braun & Hogenberg, 1572-1618]
